entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
